Image 19 of 19 Top 100 by cuisine: American and Contemporary American 1 / 19 Back to Gallery While Houston is home to a variety of bold and exotic flavors, sometimes a taste of the traditional is exactly what you need.
And that's where these local eateries come in.
From favorites that are anything but basic to modern twists that will make you rethink food, these American and Contemporary American eateries earned a spot on Alison Cook's top 100 restaurants of 2015 list.
Related: Houston's top 100 restaurants of 2015
Take a look at the gallery above to see which American and Contemporary American local restaurants made this year's list. The number next to the name of the restaurant indicates its ranking.
